c:capability.name: Color
c:capability.c:description: Model of the color setting for a device.

c:attribute.name: hue
c:attribute.description: Reflects the current hue or for lack of a better word color. May also be used to set the hue. Range is 0-360 angular degrees.

c:attribute.name: saturation
c:attribute.description: The saturation or intensity of the hue. Lower values result in less intensity (more gray) and higher values result in a more intense hue (less gray). May also be used to set the saturation.
